product_description: Looking for a little more body? Planet Oat Extra Creamy offers all the rich, smooth, creaminess you can handle. This super-satisfying beverage is great by the glass and in the kitchen. It’ll fluff your pancakes, thicken your soups and delight your taste buds. name: Minor Figures - Oat Latte - Mocha - Ready to Drink - Multi-serve - 32oz - 6 Pack - Non-GMO - Plant-Based - Vegan - Dairy-Free - Shelf Stable - Coffee - Barista Standard - Unsweetened
short_description: Minor Figures Oat Lattes (Mocha): We have Oat Lattes at Home. Ready to drink, barista-quality, and always straight from your fridge. Made with Minor Figures Barista Oat and cold-brew coffee. Our Mocha Oat Lattes are silky-smooth in texture, naturally sweet with dark chocolate notes, and designed to celebrate coffee’s natural characteristics. Just shake, pour, sip, and enjoy. Also available in Classic, Vanilla, and Cinnamon.
100% PLANT-BASED: Our Oat Lattes are 100% plant-based and non-GMO with no added sugar. All the sweetness comes naturally from oats.
READY WHEN YOU ARE: Shelf-stable oat lattes that are easy to store in a cool, dry place. Chill before serving for an authentic café-style experience; once opened, refrigerate and enjoy within 7 days.
DELICIOUS OAT LATTES, SERVED IN SECONDS: Smooth cold brew coffee blended with Minor Figures Barista Oat for a perfectly balanced, cafe-quality latte anytime of day.

name: Oatly Barista Edition Oat Milk - Crafted for Coffee | Dairy-Free, Plant-Based, Shelf-Stable Milk that makes Perfect Foam (32 oz, 6-pack)
short_description: YEP, THE SAME ONE YOUR BARISTA POURS: Get the professional-grade Oatly you love to sip at cafes, now in bulk for your very own home pantry (or office cupboard!)

NEVER RUN OUT OF THE GOOD STUFF: Stock up with 6 shelf-stable 32oz cartons of barista-grade oatmilk from the company that invented oatmilk. Daily lattes, weekend cappuccinos, and any unexpected coffee cravings—you’re totally covered from now on.

CAFÉ QUALITY FOAM: This is the oatmilk that’s crafted to perfectly froth, steam, and blend for awesome latte art (if that’s your thing) and creamy amazingness in your hot or iced coffees. Or just pour it right into your deep dark brew.
SERIOUSLY GOOD INGREDIENTS: 100% vegan, dairy-free, nut-free, soy-free, kosher and non-GMO. Plus, all Oatly products are certified glyphosate residue-free.

FOR ALL YOUR COOKING, BAKING & COFFEE-ING: Keep your personal oatmilk ‘vault’ full for consistently perfect coffees, smoothies, overnight oats, and any culinary adventure that calls for milk. Swaps 1:1 for whole cow’s milk in all your cooking and baking.

name: Edenesque Oat Milk Barista Blend - Plant Based Dairy-Free Milk & Non Dairy Coffee Creamer - Rich, Smooth, for Lattes, Smoothies, Coffee. Gluten Free, Vegan, Non-GMO, Low Sugar (32oz, 6-Pack)
short_description: CREAMY, CHEF-CRAFTED INDULGENCE Created by a Le Cordon Bleu-trained chef, our dairy-free milks feature bold, luxurious flavor and silky texture—no gums, no oils, just pure plant-based goodness.
4X MORE OATS: Made with only 6 ingredients and 4x more oats than other brands, our dairy-free out milk is rich in texture and flavor, and lightly sweetened with organic coconut nectar.

DELICIOUSLY DAIRY-FREE Silky enough for latte art, bold enough for banana‑bread batter. This lactose‑free delight enriches coffee, super‑charges smoothies, and perfects every vegan bake—proving you never trade taste for principles.
SUSTAINABLY SOURCED, ZERO WASTE: Crafted using a zero-waste process and responsibly sourced ingredients. Clean, conscious – our dairy-free milks are made to nourish both people and planet.
NOURISHING GOOD, ONE POUR AT A TIME: Female-founded and led, Edenesque donates 1% of every sale to fight food insecurity. More than delicious—it’s a movement in a bottle. #BeTheLove

name: Oatly Full Fat Oat Milk, 64 Fl Oz
short_description: Super creamy! Super plant-based!
100% cool for vegans
No dairy, no nuts, no gluten
Plus added calcium, vitamins & DHA!
Lovely beta-glucans
product_description: This plant-based product is perfectly creamy without all the saturated fats you usually get when you drink something creamy. In fact, while whole cow's milk has 5 g of saturated fat per serving, Oatly Full Fat Oatmilk only has 1 g. “Then why is it called Full Fat,” you ask? Well, this one's more about unsaturated fat (it has a lot!). So if you don't have a yacht but still want to flaunt your luxurious lifestyle, you can brag about the nice, fat oatmilk you're gulping. Before you go, we’d like to mention this product has DHA in addition to the other awesome vitamins, calcium and minerals found in all Oatly oatmilks. So if you're a person who currently drinks full fat cow's milk with DHA, it seems like you might be into switching to this Full Fat Oatmilk with DHA, especially since you're here reading a full fat oatmilk description on the internet and everything.

name: Califia Farms - Original Almond Barista Blend Almond Milk 32 Oz (Pack Of 6), Shelf Stable, Dairy Free, Plant Based, Vegan, Gluten Free, Non GMO, High Calcium, Milk Frother, Creamer
short_description: FROTH + STEAM PERFECT LATTES: With Almond Barista Blend you can froth and steam perfect dairy-free lattes at home. Naturally creamy with a neutral taste, Almond Barista Blend is made for lattes
SIMPLE PLANT-BASED INGREDIENTS: Califia Farms Barista Blends are made with plant-based, dairy-free ingredients that are Non-GMO Certified, Kosher, vegan, and free from carrageenan
BLENDS SMOOTHLY INTO COFFEE: This plant-based non-dairy Barista Blend blends beautifully into both hot and iced coffee, for a smooth and creamy cup of coffee every time
BARISTA'S CHOICE DAIRY-FREE MILK: Califia Farms Barista Blends are favored by professional baristas across the country for their ability to froth, steam, and form latte art
LOW-CAL DECADENCE: With lattes this luscious, you won’t believe there’s just 70 calories per serving.
SHELF STABLE CONVENIENCE: No need to refrigerate before opening, so you can keep your pantry stocked to your heart’s content.
A FAMILY AFFAIR: Califia Farms almonds hail almost entirely from one third-generation family farm in central California.
BOX-CHECKING GOODNESS: Non-GMO, Kosher, Vegan. Free of dairy, soy, gluten, carrageenan, BPA, and preservatives.
product_description: Upgrade your latte. Almond Barista Blend froths, foams, and steams perfectly for all your espresso creations. Neutral in taste and creamy in texture, it blends beautifully into hot or iced coffee. Simple, dairy-free, plant-based goodness

name: Planet Oat Oatmilk, Extra Creamy, 32 Fl. Oz (Pack of 6)
short_description: Sold as "Planet Oat Oatmilk, Extra Creamy, 32 Fl. Oz (Pack of 6)"
Free From: Dairy, Peanuts, Gluten, Soy, Lactose, Tree Nuts, Artificial Flavors, Artificial Colors, Artificial Preservatives.Kosher
Contains 2 grams of protein and soluble fiber per serving. State of Readiness: Ready to Drink
Oats pack a lot of punch for such a small package and – most importantly – they’re delicious
Oatmilk is great to drink by the glass, in cereal and coffee, and smoothies, even as a baking substitute
product_description: What is Planet Oat? For us, it’s the place where the whole world revolves around oats. We’re super passionate (some might say obsessed) with sharing the mighty little oat with you! Oats pack a lot of punch for such a small package and – most importantly – they’re delicious! So, to celebrate the awesomeness of this might little oat, we bring you this rich, creamy, full-bodies beverage that’s dairy free. And it contains 2 grams of protein and fiber per serving. Bring us your glasses, cereal bowls, coffee, and smoothies, and let us show you what Planet Oat oatmilk can do you for you!! Keep it classic with our subtly sweet, super satisfying Original Oatmilk. It’s full-bodied enjoyment without lactose or dairy. Sip it on its own, or add a splash to your morning (and afternoon) coffee.
